divs: Sighting DetailsMe and a couple of friends were outside looking at the stars at around midnight when this bright light appeared from the west and was cumming towards us,I stated to my friends that I thought it looked kind of strange and I didn't think that it was a plane or a star.,We all observed the object cumming closer,as it got to about 1-mile from us the object then banked to are left and as it went by the light that the object was emitting from the front only., I could see that the light was only cumming from the front cause as the object went past us the light just dimmed out and it was no longer visible to us.We all agreed that it was strange,The object made no noise at all,it was about 10,000-feet in elevation,and there were no FAA required beacons observed.What the object was that we saw is unknown.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Yelm
There were no other sightings in Yelm on or around June 16th 2012
Summary: Bright light comming sraight at us ,then banked left,light slowly faded to black as object flew above us.
